page.title: 01EMPLOYMENT
page.content: There are twelve places of employment which are quite a lot for a small village.There are four shops in Hathern ,three of which employ a paper-round.There is also a haulage company which employs twenty people.Another place of employment is a village bakery employing about twenty people.They transport bread and cakes to surrounding areas.There is an engineering company which employs a few people,they do welding and run a mini-skip hire.There is a car-repair garage which repairs,resprays and does Ministry of Transport Tests on cars.There is also a knitwear factory which makes socks,leg warmers and anything else to do with knitwear.As well as those places of employment there is a village hairdresser who employs one person.
